reviewText:
Love him or hate him, Newt is the smartest man in the room no matter who else is in the room.

Newt was the perfect person to usher in conservatism. This video is an accurate and fair report on the man and the time.
I didn't sense an of the normal liberal Hollywood slant that sneaks into nearly everything that makes it to public distribution.

Plenty of interviews from opposing democrats. But they only enforce the plan and tenacity of Newt as he pushes to implement his Contract With America.

Worth viewing over and over.
